name: 曾百由　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: 1. 簡介 2. 二極體 3. 雙極性接面電晶體 (BJT) 4. 場效電晶體 (FET) 5. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET) 6. 線性電路 7. 非線性電路應用 8. 運算放大器
schedule:
1. Semiconductor Diodes
2. Diode Applications
3. Bipolar Junction Transistors
4-5. BJT DC Biasing
6. Midterm 1
7. Field-Effect Transistors
8-9. FET Biasing
10-11. BJT AC Analysis
12. Midterm 2
13. Frequency Response
14. Two-Port System Approach
15. Operational Amplifiers
16. Op-Amp Applications
17. Digital Electronics and Circuits
18. Final
scorePolicy:
Midterm 1 20%, 
Midterm 2 20%, 
Final 30%
Quiz and Attendance 25%
Homework 5%
materials: Boylestad & Nashelsky, “Electronic Devices and Circuit Theory”, 11th Ed, Prentice Hall
remarks: 諮詢時間或課堂即時反應處理
